About the Server

Purity Vanilla is the largest vanilla anarchy server running on the latest version of Minecraft. Having surpassed 100,000 unique players, Purity has cemented itself as the place to play large-scale vanilla Minecraft, as the developers intended. Our focus has always been to leave everything up to our community. Players can travel millions of blocks away and build grand empires together, construct huge mob farms, stock up on resources to trade or simply roam the world looking for a fight.

Vanilla anarchy is exactly what it sounds like: anarchy without hacks. Anything goes within the realm of vanilla Minecraft. The only rules we have are there to ensure everyone is playing the game as intended and nobody is making the server unplayable for anybody else. We have no gameplay-altering plugins, no teleportation, no playerhomes and no pre-determined economy. We aim to provide a unique alternative to traditional anarchy servers like 2b2t, without any of the hackers, game-breaking exploits and dupes or server-killing lag machines.

We set ourselves apart by updating to the latest version of the game as soon as it is feasible, and we remain one of the only anarchy servers with a large playerbase running on the latest version of Minecraft. Our high-end server hardware allows us to have far more concurrent players on a single survival server than other survival servers like us, striving for the best performance possible without sacrificing gameplay. Join us today for a true vanilla experience.

Join our official Discord server for server announcements and updates, to get help or just to chat with other players.

Start playing Purity Vanilla today!

Server Rules

As we are a vanilla server, we have rules in place to ensure everyone is playing the game as intended

No lag machines or deliberate overuse of server resources

No use of hacked clients, external programs, X-Ray texturepacks or radar

No use of exploits or duping

If evidence is found or presented of a player breaking these rules, bans can be issued. For more information on our ban policy and the appeals process, check out this page.

DONATE TO
PURITY VANILLA

You can donate and receive cosmetic perks as a reward for supporting the server. All of our ranks are purely cosmetic and offer no game-changing rewards. Our donor ranks are a lifetime reward and will never expire. You can upgrade from one rank to another at any time just by paying the difference.

Gold and above donors have access to priority queue, with each tier having higher priority than the last. This can make joining the server much faster during peak times. Periods of "FullJoin" are also available for purchase. With FullJoin, you will skip the queue entirely and be able to join the server at any time.

More information and details on the perks of each rank are available on our webstore below.

VISIT OUR WEBSTORE

Silver

$4.99

Get access to custom nicknames, a blue username and bypass the reconnect delay and in-game chat cooldown.

Gold

$9.99

All the perks of Silver with priority queue and the ability to use colours in regular chat.

Platinum

$19.99

All the perks of Gold with the ability to use both colour and font codes on placed signs and access to /seen.

Ultimate

$39.99

All the perks of Platinum with a completely customisable nickname, access to all fonts and colours for both signs and chat and the ability to format item names in an anvil.

Prestige

$69.99

All the perks of Ultimate with the highest priority queue, access to all colours, fonts and formatting for item names and access to /hat.

VOTE FOR PURITY

Voting helps out the server for very little effort on your part and gives you useful in-game rewards that do not detract from the vanilla experience
